page.title: 09TOURISM
page.content: {GIRVAN}is easily accessible by road,rail and air. Only fifty miles from Glasgow,it has been for long a popular resort with Glaswegians although visitors now tend to come from further afield.There is a wide choice of accommodation ranging from the luxury of Turnberry Hotel to the homely Bed and Breakfast {GIRVAN}has many attractions including golf and putting,bowling,tennis,swimming(baths or sea),sea angling and dinghy sailing.Children are provided for with trampolines,sports,sand-building and special entertainments in the Beach Pavilion.During the evenings there are concerts,variety and dancing.Within easy reach are many places of historical and geographical interest, not the least being those associated with Robert Burns.
